data.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/homepage/100_c3f967121519ae40509c5b2fdf52b19d.png

skilllist.skilldesc:
Selena can switch freely between her two forms.

<font color="a6aafb">Elven Form</font>: Selena applies <font color="a6aafb">Abyssal Mark</font> when her skills deal damage. Marks last 8s and can stack up to 2 times.

<font color="a6aafb">Abyssal Form</font>: Selena's Basic Attacks become melee and deal <font color="62f8fe"> (+25% Total Magic Power)</font> additional <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font>. Her skills deal 240-450<font color="62f8fe"> (+40% Total Magic Power)</font> additional <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies with <font color="a6aafb">Abyssal Mark</font> and reduce their mark stacks by 1. This damage is increased to 200% against Creeps.

Selena summons an Abyssal Devil to lurk underground. The Abyssal Devil will attach itself to any enemy that approaches, inflicting a stack of <font color="a6aafb">Abyssal Mark</font> and reducing their Movement Speed by 50% for 1s. The Abyssal Devil then explodes, dealing 350<font color="62f8fe"> (+150% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies in the area and reducing their Movement Speed by 50% for 1s.

Each additional Abyssal Devil on an enemy increases the final damage by 50%.

Each Abyssal Devil can lurk up to 60s and up to 3 Abyssal Devils can exist at the same time.

Selena fires an abyssal wraith in the target direction that stops when it hits an enemy hero, Creep, or Summon, dealing 250<font color="62f8fe"> (+20% Total Magic Power)</font> to 500<font color="62f8fe"> (+40% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to the target hit and stunning them for 0.5s to 3s (the damage and stun duration increase with the wraith's travel distance).

The wraith will pick up <font color="a6aafb">Abyssal Trap</font> as it travels over it and will apply the traps to the enemy target upon stunning them.

If the wraith stuns an enemy for 1s or longer, Selena will gain 40% Movement Speed for 2s.
Selena enters Abyssal Form and gains 20% Movement Speed for 0.8s. This also immediately resets the cooldown of <font color="a6aafb">Soul Eater</font> and <font color="a6aafb">Garotte</font>.

Selena can switch freely between her two forms.

<font color="a6aafb">Elven Form</font>: Selena applies <font color="a6aafb">Abyssal Mark</font> when her skills deal damage. Marks last 8s and can stack up to 2 times.

<font color="a6aafb">Abyssal Form</font>: Selena's Basic Attacks become melee and deal <font color="62f8fe"> (+25% Total Magic Power)</font> additional <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font>. Her skills deal 240-450<font color="62f8fe"> (+40% Total Magic Power)</font> additional <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies with <font color="a6aafb">Abyssal Mark</font> and reduce their mark stacks by 1. This damage is increased to 200% against Creeps.

Selena strengthens her claws with the power of the Abyss, causing the next Basic Attack to dash to a target and deal an additional 200<font color="62f8fe"> (+130% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> while granting her a 300<font color="62f8fe"> (+150% Total Magic Power)</font> shield.

If this damage detonates an <font color="a6aafb">Abyssal Mark</font>, <font color="a6aafb">Garotte's</font> cooldown will reset.

Selena charges in the target direction, dealing 150<font color="62f8fe"> (+50% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies in her path.

If this skill's damage detonates an <font color="a6aafb">Abyssal Mark</font>, its cooldown will reset.
Selena enters Elven Form and gains 20% Movement Speed for 0.8s. This also immediately resets the cooldown of <font color="a6aafb">Abyssal Trap</font> and <font color="a6aafb">Abyssal Arrow</font>.

data.name: Selena

__data.skilldesc: Blink a fixed distance in the target direction and gain 5 (+1*Hero Level) extra Physical & Magic Defense afterward for 1s.
__data.skilldesc_text: Blink a fixed distance in the target direction and gain <Num1> extra Physical & Magic Defense afterward for <Num2>s.
__data.skilldescemblem: Blink a fixed distance in the target direction and gain 5 (+1*Hero Level) extra Physical & Magic Defense afterward for 1s.

recommendmasterplan.description: Roaming: Constantly provide vision for the team and try to catch enemies off guard.

emblemattr.emblemattr:
+30 Magic Power
+5% Cooldown Reduction
+8 Magic Penetration

emblemskill.skilldesc: Equipment can be purchased at 95% of their base price.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Equipment can be purchased at <%Num1> of their base price.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: Equipment can be purchased at 95% of their base price.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
Dealing damage greater than 7% of an enemy hero's Max HP 3 times within 5s will scorch the target for an additional 162-750 <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Damage</font> (scales with level).

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 15s</font>.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Dealing damage greater than <%Num3> of an enemy hero's Max HP <Num2> times within <Num1>s will scorch the target for an additional <Num5> [ffdfa2]Adaptive Damage[-] (scales with level).########[8098ab]Cooldown: <Num6>s[-].
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
Dealing damage greater than 7% of an enemy hero's Max HP 3 times within 5s will scorch the target for an additional 162-750 <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Damage</font> (scales with level).

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 15s</font>.

equiplist.equipskill1: Passive - Dire Hit: The next attack against enemy heroes below 35% HP deals 7-18% of their Max HP as extra Hybrid Damage (half Magic and half Physical).
equiplist.equipskill3: <font color="FFD700">Devotion</font>: In the first 8 min, forfeit the EXP and Gold rewards gained from minions and creeps in order to negate reductions for nearby allies.
equiplist.equipskill4: <font color="FFD700">Thriving</font>: Gain an extra 45% EXP and Gold from assists during the first 8 min. <font color="7f62fe">Unique in Team</font>: Give 8 Gold or 20 EXP to the ally with the lowest Gold or EXP every 5s. Grant 25% more if you have the lowest Gold or EXP.
equiplist.equipskill5: <font color="FFD700">Blessing</font>: Once the total amount of Gold gained from Thriving reaches 600, a skill is awarded. Gold can continue to be gained from Thriving to enhance this skill.
equiplist.equipskill6: Mysticism: Getting a kill or assist on an enemy Minion will restore 4% Mana. (An assist occurs when a Minion dies within 2s after taking damage from the hero.)
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Passive - Dire Hit: The next attack against enemy heroes below 35% HP deals 7-18% of their Max HP as extra Hybrid Damage (half Magic and half Physical).
<font color="FFD700">Devotion</font>: In the first 8 min, forfeit the EXP and Gold rewards gained from minions and creeps in order to negate reductions for nearby allies.
<font color="FFD700">Thriving</font>: Gain an extra 45% EXP and Gold from assists during the first 8 min. <font color="7f62fe">Unique in Team</font>: Give 8 Gold or 20 EXP to the ally with the lowest Gold or EXP every 5s. Grant 25% more if you have the lowest Gold or EXP.
<font color="FFD700">Blessing</font>: Once the total amount of Gold gained from Thriving reaches 600, a skill is awarded. Gold can continue to be gained from Thriving to enhance this skill.
Mysticism: Getting a kill or assist on an enemy Minion will restore 4% Mana. (An assist occurs when a Minion dies within 2s after taking damage from the hero.)

equiplist.equipskill1: Magic: Dealing Magic Damage to enemy heroes will reduce their Magic Defense by 3(+0.3*Hero Level) for 2s. Stacks up to 3 times.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Magic: Dealing Magic Damage to enemy heroes will reduce their Magic Defense by 3(+0.3*Hero Level) for 2s. Stacks up to 3 times.

equiplist.equipskill1: Resonate: Every 6s, the next skill echoes, dealing <font color="62f8fe"> (+1.2 Total Magic Power)</font> extra Magic Damage to up to 3 enemies, speeding up the hero by 30%, which decays over 2s.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Resonate: Every 6s, the next skill echoes, dealing <font color="62f8fe"> (+1.2 Total Magic Power)</font> extra Magic Damage to up to 3 enemies, speeding up the hero by 30%, which decays over 2s.

equiplist.equipskill1: Mystery: Gains 21%-35% extra Magic Power (scales with level).
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Mystery: Gains 21%-35% extra Magic Power (scales with level).

equiplist.equipskill1: Crisis: In 3s after using the skill, the caster's next Basic Attack will apply additional 100<font color="62f8fe"> (+1 Total Magic Power)</font> True Damage with a cooldown of 1.5s. Then briefly gains 10% Movement Speed.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Crisis: In 3s after using the skill, the caster's next Basic Attack will apply additional 100<font color="62f8fe"> (+1 Total Magic Power)</font> True Damage with a cooldown of 1.5s. Then briefly gains 10% Movement Speed.
equiplist.equiptips:
+70 Magic Power
+10% Cooldown Reduction
+8% Hybrid Lifesteal
+6 Mana Regen

equiplist.equipskill1: Spellbreaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Magic Penetration for each point of the enemy's Magic Defense, capped at 20%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Spellbreaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Magic Penetration for each point of the enemy's Magic Defense, capped at 20%.

recommendmasterplan.name: DEWA DRIAN
recommendmasterplan.title: Pro Player

recommendmasterplan.name: Fire Flux Esports Rosa
recommendmasterplan.title: Pro Player

data.story: Dark Elf girl who fell into the Abyss.

assist.desc: Selena works well with ranged heroes that can deal high burst damage, such as Xavier and Beatrix.

strong.desc: Selena is strong against squishy heroes with poor Mobility, simply because it's hard for them to dodge her 2nd Skill. Such as Gord and Layla.

weak.desc: But Selena is weak against heroes that can resist or remove her CC abilities, such as Hanabi and Wanwan.
